content: Little bit predictions.The name of the current situation are: " 3rd pivot trump 2025 china vs USA" Pivot means in Simple way to explain "print money"Also it's 3rd pump and trump bull run for the markets.3rd pivot it's used by bankers.China vs USA will not start war directly they just start war over tawain and that's the 3rd pivot.The world events are pretty much scripted you got to read and learn the rules just.Also the blockrock,circle and coinbase will provide CBDC service for USA.Also the start of the 4th industatial revolution when drones algorytms and AI Will take over the world using crypto as payment to each other and rest of the people Will go into metaverse.If you live wrong neighbourhood your life will look like prison just becouse the world does not have enough resources for everyone.That's why it's important to learn finances and markets otherwise you cant really choose future foryourself but it Will be choosen for you by others.If you want to be Like human then you better get wealthy becouse the Gap between rich and poor will be closed forever in the next 3 years. That's why it's important to know how to trade on the crypto Market or make money by financial ways becouse soon Even the teachers doctors and many other occupations Are not needed anymore becouse world Will moving to better sustaineble economy.Off course places like dubai or other wealthy places will be normal still and real doctors and service people not the robots or drones.This is just Simple example  and dip of the iceberg i just said here.
